scripts.dev:superapp-safe: echo 'ðŸš¨ STARTING SUPERAPP IN EMFILE-SAFE MODE...' && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' VITE_OPTIMIZE_DEPS_DISABLED=true npm run dev --workspace=d-i-o-s
scripts.dev:safe: echo 'ðŸš¨ STARTING INDIVIDUAL SERVICES TO PREVENT EMFILE' && echo 'âœ… Use: npm run dev:superapp-safe (for SuperApp - EMFILE protected)' && echo 'âœ… Use: npm run dev:admin-only (for Admin)' && echo 'âœ… Use: npm run dev:backend (for Backend)' && echo 'âŒ AVOID: npm run dev (starts both frontends - causes EMFILE)'
scripts.emfile:help: echo 'ðŸš¨ GUÃA ANTI-EMFILE - CoomÃœnity SuperApp' && echo '=========================================' && echo '' && echo 'âœ… COMANDOS SEGUROS (EMFILE-PROTECTED):' && echo '  npm run dev:superapp-safe     - SuperApp con protecciÃ³n EMFILE' && echo '  npm run dev:admin-only        - Solo Gamifier Admin' && echo '  npm run dev:backend           - Solo Backend NestJS' && echo '' && echo 'âš ï¸  COMANDOS PROBLEMÃTICOS (EVITAR):' && echo '  npm run dev                   - Inicia ambos frontends (EMFILE)' && echo '  npm run dev:superapp-only     - Puede causar EMFILE en MUI icons' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸŒ DEPLOYMENT (FUNCIONANDO):' && echo '  Vercel: https://superapp-peach.vercel.app/' && echo '  Status: âœ… Ready (optimizado para producciÃ³n)' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ”§ DIAGNÃ“STICO:' && echo '  npm run emfile:diagnose       - Analizar sistema' && echo '  ./scripts/fix-emfile-and-restart.sh - SoluciÃ³n completa' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ“± ACCESO RÃPIDO:' && echo '  Backend:  http://localhost:3002' && echo '  SuperApp: http://localhost:3001' && echo '  Admin:    http://localhost:3000'
scripts.emfile:diagnose: echo 'ðŸ” DIAGNÃ“STICO EMFILE' && echo '===================' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ“Š File descriptors:' && lsof -n | wc -l && echo 'ðŸ“Š LÃ­mite sistema:' && ulimit -n && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ” Procesos activos:' && ps aux | grep -E '(vite|npm|turbo)' | grep -v grep && echo '' && echo 'ðŸŒ Puertos ocupados:' && lsof -i :3000,3001,3002,3003,5173 2>/dev/null || echo 'NingÃºn puerto ocupado' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ—„ï¸ Backend status:' && curl -s http://localhost:3002/health | jq -r '.status' 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend no disponible'
scripts.start:backend:prod: npm run clean:backend && npm run build:backend && node dist/main.js
scripts.start:backend:compiled: npm run build:backend && cp -r backend/src/generated dist/ && node dist/main.js
